definition: to revive old dreams (idiom); to relive past experiences
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Can't repeat the past?" he cried incredulously."
sentences.chinese: “不能重溫舊夢？”他大不以爲然地喊到。

sentences.english: If two people mean to be together, eventually they will find their way back.
sentences.chinese: 如果兩個人註定在一起最終他們會找到重溫舊夢的路。

sentences.english: I am reliving moments, This is just residual grief.
sentences.chinese: 我只是重溫舊夢，這只是對你的懷念。
